div.head: 蛇虺傷人
div.div: harm caused to man by snake venom

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: harm caused to man by snake venom

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with she hui shang 蛇虺傷 , harm caused by snake venom. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry su 蘇 quotes Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 : 蛇虺傷人：紫蘇葉搗飲之 , “For harm caused to man by snake venom : Pound the leaves of zi su and drink [the liquid]”.
